descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Courier New][color=#1c4587][size=6]                 SKYRIM [i]IMMERSIVE[/i]
                 ==================
[/size][/color][/font][font=Courier New][color=#666666][size=3]I have played Skyrim for years over 100,000 hours and have owned over 15 copies on the Xbox 360 Xbox one and pc
when i first got a pc i was new to modding so i did what every new modder would do i downloaded mods without 
reading the information and i have ruined my game countless of times but like everything with time comes experience
i learned and became better at it running a perfect game that's not true no game play is perfect everyone plays with there  own style i for one love[/size][/color][/font][font=Courier New][color=#1155cc][size=4] [i]IMMERSION[/i][/size][/color][/font][font=Courier New][color=#666666][size=4] and i know a lot of other gamer's out there do as well so i figured
i would but together an [color=#1155cc][i]IMMERSIVE[/i][/color][color=#666666] Skyrim mod list that I'm sure some will enjoy 


[/color][/size][/color][/font][font=Courier New][color=#1c4587][size=5]=========================================================================
[/size][/color][/font][font=Courier New][color=#980000][size=5]                [i]    SKYRIM IMMERSIVE MOD LIST[/i]

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1.[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733?tab=description]Immersive Armors﻿ [/url]

2.[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644]Immersive Weapons[/url]﻿

3.[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222]Immersive HUD-iHUD[/url]﻿

4.TBC MORE WILL BE ADDED SOON 



































[/size][/color][/font][/b]
author: The Destroyer 01
